directions: In large saucepan over medium heat, combine sweetened condensed milk, cocoa, vanilla and salt; mix well. Slowly stir in water.  Heat through, stirring occasionally.  Do not boil.  Top with marshmallows, (optional).  Store covered in refrigerator.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk
title: Creamy Hot Chocolate
